Description: Notify the user when password has been changed.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.FullName},

 Your account password has been updated by the administrator. If you did not request this change, please [click here]({:General.SiteUrl}) to reset your password.

Thanks,

{:General.OrganizationName}
HeaderContent: Your password has been updated by system administrator
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Your password has been updated

Description: Notify the user when password has been changed.
DefaultBodyContent:
Hello {:Recipient.DisplayName},

 We received a request to reset the password for your Bold ID account. Please [click here]({:General.SiteUrl}) to reset your password.

This link will expire in two hours, so please update your password ASAP.

Thanks,
{:General.OrganizationName}
Subject: {:General.OrganizationName}: Reset password

 Your profile picture has been updated . If you did not request this change, please [click here]({:General.SiteUrl}) to reset your password.

Thanks,

{:General.OrganizationName}
